select ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname from items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

select items.id as itemId, items.item_name as itemName, items.sell_counts as sellCounts, items_img.url as imgUrl, tmpSpec.price_discount as price from items left join items_img on items.id = items_img.item_id left join ( select item_id, MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec group by item_id ) as tmpSpec on items.id = tmpSpec.item_id where items_img.is_main = 1
AND items.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
items.sell_counts desc
tmpSpec.price_discount asc
items.item_name asc
